avdta.network.node

Class SignalRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.SignalRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SignalRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents and manipulates stored signal data (Node and offset).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
